mapper.select: SELECT PKEY, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STDATE, EDDATE, TERM, REGDATE, CHKS, ENDLIST, CALWITH, WITHH, PROGRESS, RECRUIT, INTOPER, CHKSS, PHOTO, IDLIST FROM HCBOARD WHERE ENDLIST='N'
SELECT PKEY, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STDATE, EDDATE, TERM, REGDATE, CHKS, ENDLIST, CALWITH, WITHH, PROGRESS, RECRUIT, INTOPER, CHKSS, PHOTO, IDLIST FROM HCBOARD WHERE ID=#{id} AND ENDLIST='N'

SELECT PKEY, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STDATE, EDDATE, TERM, REGDATE, CHKS, ENDLIST, CALWITH, WITHH, PROGRESS, RECRUIT, INTOPER, CHKSS, PHOTO, IDLIST FROM HCBOARD WHERE WITHH ='N' AND CALWITH ='Y' AND ENDLIST='N' ORDER BY REGDATE DESC

SELECT PKEY, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STDATE, EDDATE, TERM, REGDATE, CHKS, ENDLIST, CALWITH, WITHH, PROGRESS, RECRUIT, INTOPER, CHKSS, PHOTO, IDLIST FROM HCBOARD WHERE WITHH ='Y' AND ENDLIST='N' ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
SELECT PKEY, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STDATE, EDDATE, TERM, REGDATE, CHKS, ENDLIST, CALWITH, WITHH, PROGRESS, RECRUIT, INTOPER, CHKSS, PHOTO, IDLIST FROM HCBOARD WHERE PKEY=#{pKey}
SELECT PKEY, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STDATE, EDDATE, TERM, REGDATE, CHKS, ENDLIST, CALWITH, WITHH, PROGRESS, RECRUIT, INTOPER, CHKSS, PHOTO, IDLIST FROM HCBOARD WHERE ID=#{id} AND ENDLIST='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE HCBOARD SET CHKS=#{chks}, CALWITH=#{calWith} ,CHKSS=#{chkss} WHERE PKEY=#{pKey}
UPDATE HCBOARD SET INTOPER=#{intoper}, IDLIST=#{idlist} WHERE PKEY=#{pKey}
UPDATE HCBOARD SET ENDLIST=#{endList} WHERE PKEY=#{pKey}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, WITHGOALLIST FROM HCWITHBOARD WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE HCWITHBOARD SET WITHGOALLIST=#{withGoalList} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM HCMEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT PKEY, ID, TITLE, INCHKDATE, INCHKPHOTO, INCHKTITLE, INCHKCONTENT, INCHKTIME, INCHKPHOTO2 FROM HCINCHKBOARD WHERE PKEY=#{pKey} AND INCHKDATE=#{inChkDate}
SELECT PKEY, ID, TITLE, INCHKDATE, INCHKPHOTO, INCHKTITLE, INCHKCONTENT, INCHKTIME, INCHKPHOTO2 FROM HCINCHKBOARD WHERE PKEY=#{pKey} AND INCHKDATE=#{inChkDate} AND Id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE HCINCHKBOARD SET INCHKTITLE=#{inChkTitle}, INCHKCONTENT=#{inChkContent}, INCHKPHOTO=#{inChkPhoto, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCHKPHOTO2=#{inChkPhoto2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCHKTIME=#{inChkTime} WHERE Id=#{id} AND PKEY=#{pKey} AND INCHKDATE=#{inChkDate}

mapper.select: SELECT ID, PASSWORD, NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, ENABLED, ROLE FROM HCMEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PASSWORD=#{password} AND ENABLED = 'Y'

mapper.update: UPDATE HCMEMBER SET ADDRESS=#{address}, PHONE=#{phone}, EMAIL=#{email} WHERE Id=#{id}
UPDATE HCMEMBER SET ENABLED='N' WHERE Id=#{value}
